description: Overview of the history of programming, basic concepts, and programming languages.
Understanding algorithms, their design, analysis, and the role of data structures in programming.
Introduction to web technologies, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and server-side programming languages.
Overview of major mobile platforms (Android and iOS) and their programming languages (Java, Kotlin, Swift).
Introduction to databases, the SQL language, and basic data manipulation operations.
Overview of software design principles, design patterns, and architectural patterns.
Introduction to artificial intelligence, machine learning, and basic algorithms for data processing and prediction.
Overview of the IoT concept, microcontrollers, network protocols, and applications.
Exploring career opportunities in programming, recommendations for learning, building portfolios, and job searching.
